name: Mycelium
introduce: Mycelium is a DeFi derivatives protocol has two premier financial products: Perpetual Swaps and Perpetual Pools. Mycelium Perpetual Swaps is a decentralised derivative exchanges which allows users to open leveraged long and/or short positions on crypto-assets. All traders trade against the Mycelium Liquidity Pool (MLP). The MLP is a basket of blue-chip assets and stablecoins pooled together, which acts as a global AMM for leveraged trading.
